ygData.subject: RE: Limit on song memorization
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I d like to see 8 more bubbles on the right side of the screen opposite the 8 we all have now. Verant could even make it so that it s a level thing that
ygData.messageBody:
> Does anyone think that bards should not be limited to
> memorizing only eight songs at a time?

I'd like to see 8 more bubbles on the right side of the screen opposite the
8 we all have now. Verant could even make it so that it's a level thing that
you couldn't use the other 8 spots until say level such and such (15+) like
dual wield. Makes sense. You get more experienced and are able to remember
more songs. Especially if you've been playing the first 8 songs for 15+
levels of your life.

> think the spellcasting classes really have much of a problem
> with this. Many of their spells at higher levels are just
> improved versions of spells they had at lower levels.
> They don't really have to worry about memorizing their low
> level spells once they reach a certain point.

I'd disagree here. Spellcasting classes use spells all of their lives and
normally have much higher INT/WIS stats than we as Bards do. Thus it would
make more sense for them to be able to expand their # of memorized spells
than not.
